title: [191. Number of 1 Bits](https://leetcode.cn/problems/number-of-1-bits/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
191. Number of 1 Bits Description Write a function that takes the binary representation of a positive integer and returns the number of set bits it has (also known as the Hamming weight).
 
Example 1:
Input: n = 11
Output: 3
Explanation:
The input binary string 1011 has a total of three set bits.
Example 2:
Input: n = 128
Output: 1
Explanation:
The input binary string 10000000 has a total of one set bit.
Example 3:
Input: n = 2147483645
Output: 30
Explanation:
The input binary string 1111111111111111111111111111101 has a total of thirty set bits.
 
Constraints:
1 <= n <= 231 - 1  
Follow up: If this function is called many times, how would you optimize it?
